inst.name: MT103_To_RTGSPACS008Router
inst.short-description: The JMSRequestor component is used to send messages to a JMS Topic/Queue and wait till a message reply is received from the same
inst.long-description: The JMSRequestor component is used to send messages to a JMS Topic/Queue and wait till a message reply is received from the same

inputport-instance.name: IN_PORT
inputport-instance.description: Accepts the message which has to be published on to a JMS Topic/Queue

outputport-instance.name: OUT_PORT
outputport-instance.description: Receives the message which is published on a JMS Topic/Queue
